author: The Associated Press
title: China to lift lockdown in most of virus-hit Hubei province
description: Chinese authorities are lifting a lockdown in most of its virus-hit Hubei province
content:
BEIJING -- 
Chinese authorities are lifting a lockdown in most of its virus-hit Hubei province. 
People who are cleared will be able to leave the province after midnight Tuesday. 
The city of Wuhan, where the outbreak started in late December, will remain … [+374 chars]
